https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/3ZTOxtGorh9iXwki48b5fcJKnhm.jpg Byomkesh, a detective, stumbles upon a case of robbery while recuperating from a prolonged illness. With the only object to be stolen being a group photograph, he attempts to solve the mystery. Abar Byomkesh
